article_title: Human Resources Software Helps Link Personal, Team Goals
article_text:
BetterWorks A BetterWorks goal chart

The technology, based on a methodology known as Objectives and Key Results, has fostered greater accountability at companies from automotive site Edmunds.com to Google, but it doesn’t necessarily work for everyone.
